variables.name: mTooltipText
variables.comment: * Text to be displayed in a tooltip popup.

variables.name: mAnchorX
variables.comment: * View-relative position of the tooltip anchor point.

variables.name: mTooltipFromLongClick
variables.comment: * Set to true if the tooltip was shown as a result of a long click.

variables.name: mShowTooltipRunnable
variables.comment: * Keep these Runnables so that they can be used to reschedule.

variables.name: mHoverSlop
variables.comment: * Hover move is ignored if it is within this distance in pixels from the previous one.

methods.name: private boolean updateAnchorPos(MotionEvent event)
methods.comment:
* Update the anchor position if it significantly (that is by at least mHoverSlop)
         * different from the previously stored position. Ignoring insignificant changes
         * filters out the jitter which is typical for such input sources as stylus.
         *
         * @return True if the position has been updated.

methods.name: private void clearAnchorPos()
methods.comment: *  Clear the anchor position to ensure that the next change is considered significant.
